description: This notification signifies that the configured thresholds
for bearers at gateway level are reached. The gateway name
identifies the notifying gateway name and the next two

Summary.eval: ($v2==2 && $v3==2) ?  'Gateway level bearers thresholds are normal' : (($v2==1 && $v3==1) ? 'Both gateway level bearers thresholds exceeded' : (($v2==1 && $v3==2) ? 'Gateway level bearers threshold 1 exceeded' : 'Gateway level bearers threshold 2 exceeded'))

description: A string that uniquely identifies the mobile edge gateway.
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-SM-MIB::jnxMbgPgwGatewayName

description: This notification signifies that the configured thresholds
for CPU have been reached. The gateway name identifies the
notifying gateway and the next two fields would indicate

Summary.eval: ($v2==2 && $v3==2) ?  'CPU utilization is normal' : (($v2==1 && $v3==1) ? 'Both CPU utilization thresholds exceeded' : (($v2==1 && $v3==2) ? 'CPU utilization threshold 1 exceeded' : 'CPU utilization threshold 2 exceeded'))

description: A string that uniquely identifies the mobile edge gateway.
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-SM-MIB::jnxMbgPgwGatewayName

description: This notification indicates whether the configured thresholds
for Memory have been reached. The gateway name identifies the
notifying gateway name and the next two fields would indicate

Summary.eval: ($v2==2 && $v3==2) ?  'Memory utilization is normal' : (($v2==1 && $v3==1) ? 'Both memory utilization thresholds exceeded' : (($v2==1 && $v3==2) ? 'Memory utilization threshold 1 exceeded' : 'Memory utilization threshold 2 exceeded'))

description: A string that uniquely identifies the mobile edge gateway.
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-SM-MIB::jnxMbgPgwGatewayName

description: This notification signifies that the configured APN thresholds
for bearers have been reached. The APN Name identifies for
which APN the thresholds are being reported and the next two

Summary.eval: ($v2==2 && $v3==2) ?  'Bearers APN thresholds are not exceeded' : (($v2==1 && $v3==1) ? 'Bearers APN thresholds exceeded' : (($v2==1 && $v3==2) ? 'Bearers APN threshold 1 exceeded' : 'Bearers APN threshold 2 exceeded'))

description: A string that uniquely identifies an APN .
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-SM-MIB::jnxMbgPgwQosAPNName
